data.title: MyJones Wholesale
data.meta_description: Made with pure cane sugar and featuring the most unique packaging in the beverage industry, Jones Soda is a one-of-a-kind premium craft soda known for its bold, unique flavors, colors, and ever-changing labels submitted by our consumers. #thepeoplescraftsoda
data.text:
We have our top 6 flavors available for customizing. They are Berry Lemonade, Green Apple, Root Beer, Cream Soda, Strawberry Lime, and Orange and Cream. Sometimes we have limited edition flavors available for customizing as well, but those 6 flavors are our core custom flavors. See what's available by clicking here.

For non-custom orders, please allow 1-2 business days before arranging pickup.

For custom orders, production of orders will take 7-10 business days. Orders will be ready to pick up after then, we will shoot you an email when they are ready. If you need it quicker than that timeline, please email us so we can expedite the production on your order. This will cost an additional $5 per 12-pack.

If you need your order quicker than the provided timelines, please email us so we can expedite the production on your order. This will cost an additional $5 per 12-pack.

Please reach out to us directly and we will work with you on a delivery quote, myjones@jonessoda.com. Please expect additional charges for delivery.

This is completely up to you! We have provided our retail pricing for our packs online as a comparison. We hope the wholesale pricing compared to our online pricing will still allow you to provide a deal for your customers compared to if they bought directly from us. But how much you would like to charge your customer's is up to you.

Discount codes will be associated with the email on the application and will only be able to be used through that email. If you would like other emails to be able to use your code, please reach out to myjones@jonessoda.com.

If a discount code has not been used for a year, we will reach out to see if you are still interested in the program. If not, we will delete the code.

One discount code can only be used for custom MyJones product. The other code can only be used on regular Jones labeled product. Each discount will be associated to specific products and the discounts will reflect on the checkout screen.
